Item.comments: called from other Methods to add an Action Item row (of defined relationship type) to this Item
Item.method_code:
' arguments must be passed in as custom attributes of the item context ' ' <Item type="##thisType##" .. actionRelationshipName=".." actionOwnerId=".." actionManagerId=".." ' actionDescr='..' actionPriority='..' actionType='..' actionDueDate="YYYY-MM-DD" actionCloseBeforeState=".." ' ' Optional are: actionDueDate and actionCloseBeforeState and actionType,actionPriority ' ' if actionRelationshipName is not set, then only the actionItem item is created and returned ' else the action item is created and connected to the defined relationship assuming thisItem to be the source item ' 'MethodTemplateName=VBMain; Dim inn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator()
Function Main() As Item 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() Dim relationshipName As String = Me.getAttribute("actionRelationshipName","") Dim isAddRelatedActionItem As Boolean = (Me.getAttribute("addRelatedActionItem","0") = "1") 'defaults to 0, if not set Dim isStartRelatedActionItem As Boolean = (Me.getAttribute("startRelatedActionItem","0") = "1") 'defaults to 0, if not set
Dim actionOwnerId As String = Me.getAttribute("actionOwnerId","") Dim actionManagerId As String = Me.getAttribute("actionManagerId","") Dim actionDescr As String = Me.getAttribute("actionDescr","") Dim actionPriority As String = Me.getAttribute("actionPriority","medium") Dim actionType As String = Me.getAttribute("actionType","generic_action") Dim dueDate As String = Me.getAttribute("actionDueDate","") Dim isClosingNotesRequired As String = Me.getAttribute("closingNotesRequired","") Dim closeBeforeState As String = Me.getAttribute("actionCloseBeforeState","")
If actionOwnerId = "" Or actionDescr = "" Then Return inn.newError("Missing argument values (custom attributes) for actionRelationshipName,actionOwnerId, or actionDescr")
'create Action Item for owner Dim actionItemId As String = inn.getNewID() Dim actionItem As Item = Me.newItem ("gAction Item","add") actionItem.setID(actionItemId) actionItem.setProperty("action_item_description",actionDescr) actionItem.setProperty("action_item_priority",actionPriority) actionItem.setProperty("action_item_type",actionType) actionItem.setProperty("owned_by_id",actionOwnerId) actionItem.setProperty("is_closing_notes_required",isClosingNotesRequired)
If actionManagerId <> "" Then actionItem.setProperty("managed_by_id",actionManagerId)
If dueDate <> "" Then actionItem.setProperty("action_item_due_date",dueDate)
' Grant 'Aras PLM' permissions for the merge call Dim plmIdentity As Aras.Server.Security.Identity = Aras.Server.Security.Identity.GetByName("Super User") Dim PermissionWasSet As Boolean = Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.GrantIdentity(plmIdentity) Dim res As Item
If relationshipName <> "" Then Dim thisItemActionRel As Item = Me.newItem (relationshipName,"add")
'relationship may have replicated properties for 'description,due_date' etc., which may be set to be a required property. 'if relationship does not have this property, it will be ignored. thisItemActionRel.setProperty("action_item_description",actionDescr)
thisItemActionRel.setProperty("owned_by_id",actionOwnerId) thisItemActionRel.setProperty("action_item_priority",actionPriority) If actionManagerId <> "" Then thisItemActionRel.setProperty("managed_by_id",actionManagerId) If dueDate <> "" Then thisItemActionRel.setProperty("action_item_due_date",dueDate) If isClosingNotesRequired <> "" Then thisItemActionRel.setProperty("is_closing_notes_required",isClosingNotesRequired)
thisItemActionRel.setProperty("source_id",Me.getID()) 'thisItemActionRel.setProperty("sort_order","1")
If closeBeforeState <> "" Then thisItemActionRel.setProperty("source_item_check_rule","CloseBeforeSourceItemState") thisItemActionRel.setProperty("source_item_check_status",closeBeforeState) End If
If Not isAddRelatedActionItem Then isStartRelatedActionItem = False 'ensure no attempt is made to start the action Else thisItemActionRel.setRelatedItem(actionItem) End If
res = thisItemActionRel.apply() 'add relationship with or without related action
Else 'creates action item only, without relationship to other res = actionItem.apply()
End If If res.isError() Then Return res
'promote the action item's life cycle to "Open" If isStartRelatedActionItem Then actionItem = Me.newItem("gAction Item","promoteItem") actionItem.setID(actionItemId) actionItem.setProperty("state","Open") actionItem = actionItem.apply() If actionItem.isError() Then Return actionItem End If
'Revoke 'Aras PLM' permissions If (PermissionWasSet) Then Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.RevokeIdentity(plmIdentity)
Return res End Function
